english_example_sentence: If they had stood guard, the enemy wouldn't have entered.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они стояли на страже, враг бы не вошел.
turkish_example_sentence: Onlar nöbet tutmuşlarsa, düşman askerleri şehre asla giremezdi.
